mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, TISSUE_CREATED_DATE, TISSUE_POINT, TISSUE_HISTORY FROM TBL_TISSUE ORDER BY ID DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_TISSUE(ID, USER_ID, TISSUE_CREATED_DATE, TISSUE_POINT, TISSUE_HISTORY) VALUES(#{id}, #{userId}, #{tissueCreatedDate}, #{tissuePoint}, #{tissueHistory})
